Analysis of cognitive processes involved in task performance to identify potential failure points.

Implementation Process

A systematic approach to implementing human reliability analysis and improvement programs

01

Assessment

Evaluate current human performance and identify areas for improvement.

02

Analysis

Analyze human factors, error modes, and performance indicators.

03

Strategy Development

Develop human reliability improvement strategies and training programs.

04

Implementation

Implement training programs and human reliability improvement measures.

05

Monitoring

Continuously monitor human performance and reliability indicators.

06

Optimization

Continuously optimize human reliability through feedback and improvement.
